tumor_size_max_dimension_evidence: The mass measures 2.4 x 2.S em in greatest dimension.
pT_evidence: KERATINIZING SQUAMOUS CELL CARCINOMA GRADE II (2.5 CM). - INVOLVEMENT OF THE LEFT MAIN BRONCHUS.
tumor_stage_evidence: Based on AJCC7 criteria, pT2 and pN0 corresponds to Stage IIB.
histologic_diagnosis_stated: KERATINIZING SQUAMOUS CELL CARCINOMA GRADE II
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: - KERATINIZING SQUAMOUS CELL CARCINOMA GRADE II (2.5 CM).
comment: The pathology report indicates a keratinizing squamous cell carcinoma grade II in the left lung with involvement of the left main bronchus and no evidence of tumor spread to lymph nodes or distant sites. The greatest dimension of the tumor is stated as 2.5 cm, which corresponds to pT2 category under AJCC7 criteria.
